faqs.description: Find answers to common questions about Mystery Maker

whatIsMysteryMaker.question: What is Mystery Maker and how does it work?
whatIsMysteryMaker.answer: Mystery Maker is an AI-powered platform that creates custom murder mystery parties exactly how you want them. Tell us your unique vision - any theme, characters, or setting - and our AI generates everything you need: character profiles, clues, and host materials tailored specifically for your party.

creationProcess.question: How does the creation and purchase process work?
creationProcess.answer: Simple! First, describe your ideal murder mystery and we'll create a custom preview for free. When you're happy with your mystery, purchase the complete package for $24.99. You'll instantly get everything needed to host: detailed character profiles, host guide, and all game materials.

saveWork.question: Can I save my work and come back to it later?
saveWork.answer: Yes! All your custom mysteries are saved to your account so you can return and edit them anytime.

replayable.question: Are these murder mysteries replayable?
replayable.answer: Absolutely! Our mysteries include variable elements so each playthrough feels fresh, even with the same group. You can host your custom mystery as many times as you want.

playerCount.question: How many players do I need?
playerCount.answer: Our system creates mysteries for any group size you specify - from intimate gatherings of 4-6 players to larger parties of 15+ players. Just tell us your player count and we'll design accordingly.

modifyMystery.question: Can I modify my mystery after creating it?
modifyMystery.answer: Of course! Use our editor to refine and adjust your mystery until it's exactly right for your group. Change characters, themes, or complexity anytime.

lastMinuteChanges.question: What if I need to add or remove players at the last minute?
lastMinuteChanges.answer: No problem! Our flexible system allows you to adjust your player count even after creating your mystery. The AI will adapt the story and characters to accommodate these changes.

whatIncluded.question: What's included in my custom mystery package?
whatIncluded.answer: Everything you need: a comprehensive host guide with step-by-step instructions, detailed character profiles for each player, clues, evidence, and all game materials. No additional preparation required.

gameDuration.question: How long does a typical game last?
gameDuration.answer: Most mysteries run 2-3 hours, but you control the pacing. Our host guide includes timing suggestions that you can adjust to fit your schedule.

themedMysteries.question: Do you offer themed mysteries for special occasions?
themedMysteries.answer: We create any theme you can imagine! From classic 1920s speakeasies to space stations to fairy tale kingdoms - tell us your vision and we'll make it happen.

ageRecommendation.question: Is there an age recommendation for your mysteries?
ageRecommendation.answer: Our standard mysteries work great for adults and teens (13+). You can also request family-friendly themes when creating your mystery for younger players.

freePreview.question: What's included in the free preview?
freePreview.answer: You can create unlimited mystery previews for free, including the basic story premise and character concepts. This lets you explore different ideas before purchasing.

purchaseIncludes.question: What do I get when I purchase a mystery?
purchaseIncludes.answer: For $24.99, you receive everything needed to host: comprehensive host guide, detailed character profiles for each player, clues, evidence, and all game materials ready to use.

refund.question: Can I get a refund if I'm not satisfied?
refund.answer: Absolutely! If you're not completely satisfied with your purchase, contact us within 7 days and we'll issue a full refund, no questions asked.

gameDesignEngagement.question: Hur säkerställer er speldesign att alla förblir engagerade?
gameDesignEngagement.answer: Våra mysterier fokuserar på rika karaktärsinteraktioner snarare än rigida berättelser. Varje karaktär har detaljerade bakgrunder och motiv som driver naturligt spelande, vilket säkerställer att alla spelare förblir aktivt involverade under hela upplevelsen.

dynamicMurderer.question: Varför pekar inte ledtrådarna på en specifik mördare från början?
dynamicMurderer.answer: Mördaren bestäms efter första omgången baserat på ledtrådar som avslöjas under spelet. Detta dynamiska tillvägagångssätt innebär att ledtrådar byggs progressivt, vilket gör mysteriet lösbart även om vissa detaljer missas i feststämningen.

flexiblePlayerCount.question: Vad händer om någon inte kan komma i sista minuten?
flexiblePlayerCount.answer: Vår flexibla design hanterar ändringar i sista minuten. Eftersom spelet inte är beroende av att en karaktär har kritisk information kan du justera ditt antal spelare utan att förstöra mysteriet.

characterFocused.question: Varför karaktärsfokuserad istället för plotfokuserad?
characterFocused.answer: Års erfarenhet har lärt oss att alltför specifika ledtrådar missas på fester. Vårt karaktärsdrivna tillvägagångssätt innebär att mysteriet utvecklas naturligt genom interaktioner.
